name: Sunday Night Soups: Perla Meyers' Celeriac Soup of '73
description: The final Sunday Night Soup of the year features a visit by the Titans of Tennessee to the Colts of Indianapolis. As it happens, these are the Gurgling Cod’s two least favorite NFL franchises. The Titans deliberately injured Patriot safety...
recipeIngredient: 4 smallish or 2 large celery roots aka celeriac peeled and cubed
8 cups chicken stock (you should use the real stuff here)

recipeInstructions.text: Melt butter in large casserole. Soften onions, without browning, for 5 minutes.
Add celeriac, potatoes and parsnips, season with salt and pepper, and cover with chicken stock. Add bouquet garni. Bring to boil, and simmer for 45 minutes, or until all vegetables are tender.
Allow soup to cool, and puree with blender or food mill.
Thin the soup with cream (That’s what Perla says – it was the 70s, after all.) Reheat, and garnish with finely chopped parsley.
